treatment-md.title: Labiobulura (Labiobulura) peramelis Smales, 2009, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: A review of the nematode genus Labiobulura (Ascaridida: Subuluridae) parasitic in bandicoots (Peramelidae) and bilbies (Thylocomyidae) from Australia and rodents (Murinae: Hydromyini) from Papua New Guinea with the description of two new species
